what: Download all Statcast data within a range of dates — statcast
title: Download all Statcast data within a range of dates — statcast
text: Download Statcast data within range dates

title: Download all Statcast data within a range of dates — statcast
code: statcast(   start = Sys.Date() - 1,   end = NULL,   batter = NULL,   pitcher = NULL,   process = FALSE,   names = FALSE,   tibble = TRUE,   verbose = FALSE )

title: Download all Statcast data within a range of dates — statcast
text: start Start date search. end End data search. Defaults NULL, stops search atstart date. batter Statcast player ID batter interest. Defaults NULL. pitcher Statcast player ID pitcher interest. Defaults NULL. process Controls processing data. Defaults FALSE. TRUE, data processed using statcast_min_process function. names Controls processing names. Defaults FALSE. TRUE, names processed using statcast_names function. tibble Controls class object returned. Defaults TRUE returns tibble. FALSE, returns data.frame. verbose Controls messaging user. Defaults FALSE provides message. TRUE, informs user date begins downloading.

title: Download all Statcast data within a range of dates — statcast
text: data.frame tibble containing Statcast events start date end date inclusive.
